bibl.title: The Demotic and Greek Ostraca from Elkab.
bibl.note: Pays attention to the relationship between demotic and Greek ostraca and to the links between them and the archaeological remains.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I

bibl.seg: QUAEGEBEUR Jan, The Demotic and Greek Ostraca from Elkab.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I (Cairo, 1992) pp. 671-685, 10 figg.
Pays attention to the relationship between demotic and Greek ostraca and to the links between them and the archaeological remains.
